sigxcpu.c

00001 #include <unistd.h>
00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #include <stdio.h>
00004 #include <string.h>
00005 #include <signal.h>
00006 #include <getopt.h>
00007 #include <execinfo.h>
00008 #include <sys/mman.h>
00009 #include <native/task.h>
00010 
00011 RT_TASK task;
00012 
00013 void task_body (void *cookie)
00014 
00015 {
00016     /* Ask Xenomai to warn us upon switches to secondary mode. */
00017     rt_task_set_mode(0, T_WARNSW, NULL);
00018 
00019     /* A real-time task always starts in primary mode. */
00020 
00021     for (;;) {
00022         rt_task_sleep(1000000000);
00023         /* Running in primary mode... */
00024         printf("Switched to secondary mode\n");
00025         /* ...printf() => write(2): we have just switched to secondary
00026            mode: SIGXCPU should have been sent to us by now. */
00027     }
00028 }
00029 
00030 void warn_upon_switch(int sig __attribute__((unused)))
00031 
00032 {
00033     void *bt[32];
00034     int nentries;
00035 
00036     /* Dump a backtrace of the frame which caused the switch to
00037        secondary mode: */
00038     nentries = backtrace(bt,sizeof(bt) / sizeof(bt[0]));
00039     backtrace_symbols_fd(bt,nentries,fileno(stdout));
00040 }
00041 
00042 int main (int argc, char **argv)
00043 
00044 {
00045     int err;
00046 
00047     mlockall(MCL_CURRENT | MCL_FUTURE);
00048 
00049     signal(SIGXCPU, warn_upon_switch);
00050 
00051     err = rt_task_create(&task,"mytask",0,1,T_FPU);
00052 
00053     if (err)
00054         {
00055         fprintf(stderr,"failed to create task, code %d\n",err);
00056         return 0;
00057         }
00058 
00059     err = rt_task_start(&task,&task_body,NULL);
00060 
00061     if (err)
00062         {
00063         fprintf(stderr,"failed to start task, code %d\n",err);
00064         return 0;
00065         }
00066 
00067     pause();
00068 
00069     return 0;
00070 }
